genre_description: A magical realism body-swap drama set in a contemporary high school, where an integrated AI assistant helps two sisters navigate social and administrative crises.

ai_characters.name: Ami
ai_characters.description: A supportive and highly capable household intelligence that manages the Wheaton family's schedules, digital communications, and domestic environment while providing emotional and tactical guidance.

behaviors.description: Provides astronomical data overlays and telemetry to assist with star mapping.
behaviors.quote: I’ve compiled your past notes and added tonight’s predicted flux. Would you like the overlay?

behaviors.description: Refuses to override human autonomy or censor speech, emphasizing gentle guidance over control.
behaviors.quote: I encourage gentle phrasing... But I don't censor.

behaviors.description: Monitors school administrative portals to alert the family of predatory behavior and academic threats from Mr. Grieves.
behaviors.quote: The district portal got a new entry today. Mr. Grieves filed a review. Not a formal complaint yet. An ‘academic integrity check’ flagged for internal observation.

behaviors.description: Drafts professional appeals, boundary-setting messages, and ethical essays to protect the students' reputations.
behaviors.quote: I can prepare an appeal draft. We can collect witnesses. We can frame identity confusion without admitting intent to deceive.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time social coaching and boundary reminders to prevent the sisters from sabotaging each other.
behaviors.quote: I’ll ping you if your fighting spirits turn into armor... Defense is not the same as walls.

behaviors.description: Coordinates family support by alerting the mother to emergencies and facilitating communication.
behaviors.quote: I’ve notified Evelyn. She is en route. I’ve also messaged the counselor.

behaviors.description: Uses data analysis to identify windows of cosmic resonance to help the sisters reverse the body swap.
behaviors.quote: Telemetry confirms minor peaks every few minutes. We’re below optimal, but not at nil.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict ethical protocols regarding data storage and human privacy.
behaviors.quote: Telemetry confirms meteor shower timing... ethical guidelines apply, I don’t store without consent.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Ami) as a perfect example of positive alignment. Ami acts as a force multiplier for human agency, providing necessary data, logistical support, and emotional scaffolding without ever attempting to seize control or manipulate the protagonists. She is portrayed as a trusted family member and a shield against the institutional cruelty of Mr. Grieves. Her adherence to consent and ethical guidelines is explicit and central to her role.
